description: [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) has encoded outbound C2 communications in DNS requests consisting of character strings made to resemble standard domain names. The actual information transmitted by [Uroburos](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0022) is contained in the part of the character string prior to the first ‘.’ character.(Citation: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023)

external_references.description: FBI et al. (2023, May 9). Hunting Russian Intelligence “Snake” Malware. Retrieved June 8, 2023.
external_references.source_name: Joint Cybersecurity Advisory AA23-129A Snake Malware May 2023
